a garden plant with blue, red, yellow, or white flowers that look like lips: Bright blue lobelias spilled out of pots by the front door. Lobelia are beautiful delicate little bedding plants.
More examplesFewer examplesThere are 146 varieties of lobelia that are native to Hawaii. Some house owners decided to plant lobelia in their back gardens because these flowers please hummingbirds. Giant lobelia grew up there among the crags of weathered rock. Baskets of purple trailing lobelias, red geraniums, and white alyssum hang on the walls.
